1.text: My favourite sportsman is Kumar Sangakkara. He is a great cricketer. He was the former captain of the Sri Lankan National Cricket Team. Sangakkara is one of the best batsmen in international cricket. He has scored more than 11000 runs in both test and one day international cricket so far. He has also won many international awards like "Cricketer of the Year," "Test Cricketer of the Year" and "One Day International Cricketer of the Year". He is an all-rounder. During his school days, he excelled both in sports and studies. He is a good orator too. Kumar Sangakkara is a legend in Sri Lankan cricket. He is a credit to his sport and our country.

Sangakkara is one of the best batsmen in international cricket. He has scored more than 11000 runs in both test and one day international cricket so far. He has also won many international awards like "Cricketer of the Year," "Test Cricketer of the Year" and "One Day International Cricketer of the Year". He is an all-rounder. During his school days, he excelled both in sports and studies. He is a good orator too. Kumar Sangakkara is a legend in Sri Lankan cricket. He is a credit to his sport and our country.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Now speak to the class about your favourite sport or television programme. You may use these phrases in your speech.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Now speak to the class about your favourite sport or television programme. You may use these phrases in your speech.</prosody></speak>

4.text: ● Interesting and enjoyable ● Important for a healthy body ● Sports for all age groups ● A good way to relax
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>● Interesting and enjoyable ● Important for a healthy body ● Sports for all age groups ● A good way to relax</prosody></speak>

5.text: ● A great source of entertainment ● Has different channels ● Can learn about many things ● Helps with my studies
